segments.text: I see the woman drying dishes, completely oblivious to the water overflowing from the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in a puddle, but she doesn't seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the dishes stacked neatly on the counter, ready to be put away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring over the edge, creating a big mess on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy standing on a wobbly stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing nearby, looking up at the boy with her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they are trying to be quiet so the woman doesn't notice them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's focus is entirely on the cookie jar, not on his balance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't end up falling and hurting themselves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, unlike the chaos inside the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR
